title: Tigo 'Xtreme Value Offer' gives unlimited calls to customers
text:
Business & Finance | 15 September 2015 17:00 CET Tigo 'Xtreme Value Offer' gives unlimited calls to customers By GNA 
Accra, Sept. 15, GNA - Telecommunication Company, Tigo Ghana has introduced a new product called the 'Xtreme Value Offer', which gives customers in the Western, Ashanti and Eastern regions unlimited calls from 6am to 6pm each day. 
The offer comes in two value-packed affordable packages; 'Xtreme Voice and Data', and 'Xtreme Voice'. 
A statement issued in Accra by Veronica Owusu-Ansah, Communications Specialist, Tigo said the 'Xtreme Voice and Data' is just 50 Ghana pesewas a day and gives customers unlimited calls to Tigo lines. 
It said the service also gives 20MB data for browsing the internet. 
'The 'Xtreme Voice' at 30 Ghana pesewas a day offers customers the opportunity to make unlimited voice calls to all Tigo numbers,' it added. 
Mr Tara Squire, the Director of Mobile at Tigo Ghana, said customers could subscribe to the offer by dialling *510# and follow the voice prompt. 
He revealed that the tailor-made offer was designed based on feedback received from customers within these regions, adding that other regions would not be left out but also enjoy region specific offers. 
'For now, our customers in the other regions can enjoy our amazing packages including Tigo Big 6, which gives customers the freedom to do more on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, WhatsApp and many more social media channels,' he explained. 
He said, the company would continue to introduce innovative products and services to meet the needs of its customers. 
GNA
